prerequisites: Prerequisite: German 204 or equivalent; Concurrent registration in German 219
summary: This optional discussion section for German 219 offers course participants proficient in German the opportunity to apply their background in foreign languages and cultures to the topic of German postwar film. Students will discuss and engage with original texts from various German media that complement the required course readings, such as German film reviews, print and TV interviews, literary sources or short films. We will also critique subtitles and analyze the use of idiomatic German in selected scenes.
title: German Film After 1945: German Discussion Section
